item.title: 中国平安保险第一季度利润下降 26.4
item.description: 中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司周五公布第一季度净利润下降 26.4%。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co of China Ltd reported a 26.4% decline in first-quarter net profit on Friday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国寻求与印度就电子商务、农作物和数据存储达成贸易协议
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，正在讨论的美印贸易协定将涵盖 19 个类别，包括扩大农产品、电子商务、数据存储和关键矿产的市场准入。【原文：A U.S.-India trade agreement under discussion will cover 19 categories, including greater market access for farm goods, e-commerce, data storage and critical minerals, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 汽车制造商急于满足中国对长程混合动力汽车的激增需求
item.description: 中国汽车制造商和外国竞争对手正在推出更先进的长程混合动力汽车，以满足全球最大汽车市场不断增长的需求。【原文：Chinese automakers and foreign rivals are launching ever more advanced long-range hybrids to meet rising demand in the world's largest auto market.】

item.title: 部长称三星将向印度南部工厂投资 1.17 亿美元
item.description: 韩国三星电子公司将投资 100 亿卢比（1.1709 亿美元）建设其在印度南部的工厂，一位部长周五表示，数月前，该工厂曾因员工停职而面临工人抗议。【原文：South Korea's Samsung Electronics will invest 10 billion rupees ($117.09 million) in its facility in southern India, a minister said on Friday, months after the plant faced worker protests following employee suspensions.】

item.title: 人工智能推动测试发展，日本 Advantest 预计年利润增长 6
item.description: 日本芯片测试设备制造商 Advantest 周五预测，受人工智能任务所用芯片测试工具需求的推动，其下一财年的营业利润将增长 6%。【原文：Japanese chip testing equipment maker Advantest forecast its operating profit to grow 6% next fiscal year on Friday, buoyed by demand for its testing tools for chips used in the artificial intelligence tasks.】

item.title: RWE 已停止在美国的海上风电活动
item.description: 鉴于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）执政期间的监管不确定性，RWE 公司首席执行官在该公司年度股东大会前发表的一份演讲稿中表示，RWE 暂时停止了其在美国的海上风电活动。【原文：RWE has stopped its U.S. offshore wind activities for now in light of regulatory uncertainty under the administration of President Donald Trump, its CEO said in a speech manuscript published ahead of the utility's annual general meeting.】

item.title: 日本野村集团首席财务官表示，年度利润创历史新高，可应对波涛汹涌的市场
item.description: 日本最大的投资银行和经纪商野村控股第四季度净利润增长了 27%，创下了有史以来最高的全年利润，原因是该公司各业务部门的收入均比去年同期有所增长。【原文：Japan's biggest investment bank and brokerage Nomura Holdings recorded a 27% rise in fourth-quarter net profit to hit its highest ever full year profit as revenue grew in each of its business segments over the year.】

item.title: 英特尔股价因预期不佳而下挫
item.description: 周五，英特尔股价在法兰克福的激烈交易中下跌近4%，前一天英特尔还发布了营收和利润的下调预期，投资者对中美贸易战背景下芯片行业的前景感到担忧。【原文：Intel shares dropped almost 4% in heavy trading in Frankfurt on Friday after issuing downbeat forecasts for both revenue and profit the day before, as investors fretted about the outlook for the chip sector against the backdrop of the U.S./China trade war.】

item.title: 营收超出预期，Alphabet 法兰克福上市股票上涨
item.description: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 的法兰克福上市股票周五早盘上涨超过 6%，因为这家科技巨头周四的季度营收超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：Google parent Alphabet's Frankfurt-listed shares rose over 6% in early trade on Friday after the tech giant beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 Yandex 公司第一季度收入增长 34
item.description: 俄罗斯互联网巨头 Yandex 公布第一季度收入增长 34%，达到 3 065 亿卢布（37.1 亿美元），主要得益于电子商务以及搜索和门户业务的增长。【原文：Russian internet giant Yandex reported a 34% rise in first-quarter revenue to 306.5 billion roubles ($3.71 billion), driven by growth in e-commerce and its search and portal business.】

item.title: 汽车制造商在上海车展上推出影院体验和迷你厨房
item.description: 汽车制造商希望在不断创新的中国汽车市场中脱颖而出，在本周的上海车展上推出了配备沉浸式娱乐、香味控制、车载冰箱甚至火锅烹饪设备的汽车。【原文：Car manufacturers looking to stand out in China's constantly innovating auto market unveiled cars at Shanghai's auto show this week featuring immersive entertainment, fragrance control, in-car refrigerators and even hot pot cooking equipment.】

item.title: 重组亏损预示扭亏为盈，日产汽车股价上涨
item.description: 由于资产价值大幅缩水和巨额重组费用（这些费用似乎旨在为急需的扭亏为盈扫清障碍），日产汽车公布了创纪录的亏损，其股价周五上涨了近 2%。【原文：Nissan saw its shares rise almost 2% on Friday after it flagged a record loss due to a massive reduction in the value of its assets and hefty restructuring fees - costs that appeared aimed at clearing the decks for a badly needed turnaround.】

item.title: 三星 SDI 称关税预计将提高美国产电池的生产成本
item.description: 韩国三星 SDI 周五表示，美国关税将增加其在美国生产电动汽车（EV）电池的成本，因为生产所需的许多材料和零部件都需要进口。【原文：South Korea's Samsung SDI on Friday said U.S. tariffs will increase the cost of producing its electric vehicle (EV) batteries in the United States, as many materials and components required for it are imported.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，阿斯特化学公司将竞购埃克森美孚在新加坡的加油站
item.description: 五位知情人士称，布孔炼油厂的新运营商阿斯特化学与能源公司正计划竞购埃克森美孚在新加坡的加油站，因为该炼油厂正在寻求零售燃料销售点。【原文：Aster Chemicals and Energy, the new operator of the Bukom refining complex, is planning to bid for Exxon Mobil's petrol stations in Singapore, five people with knowledge of the matter said, as the refiner seeks retail fuel sales outlets.】

item.title: 一些欧洲企业质疑美国在关税乱局中的扩张行为
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在关税问题上反复无常的态度，让一些欧洲小公司对拓展美国市场的益处产生了怀疑，这表明在世界第一大经济体中开展贸易变得多么艰难。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's erratic approach to tariffs is causing some smaller European companies to question the benefits of expanding in the U.S. market - a sign of how tough it has become to navigate trade in the world's top economy.】

item.title: 消息人士称中国考虑对部分商品免征美国关税
item.description: 中国正在考虑豁免部分美国进口商品 125% 的关税，并要求企业提供可能符合条件的商品清单，这是迄今为止最大的迹象，表明中国政府担心与华盛顿的贸易战会带来经济影响。【原文：China is considering exempting some U.S. imports from its 125% tariffs and is asking businesses to provide lists of goods that could be eligible in the biggest sign yet that Beijing is worried about the economic fallout from its trade war with Washington.】

item.title: 美国关税打击消费者信心，7-Eleven 老板称需要削减成本
item.description: 7-Eleven 便利店的所有者 Seven & I 控股公司表示，由于美国消费者正在努力应对美国关税的影响，该公司预计将不得不认真审视其供应链并控制成本。【原文：Seven & I Holdings , the owner of 7-Eleven convenience stores, said it expects it will have to take a hard look at its supply chain and rein in costs as U.S. consumers grapple with the impact of U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 早间竞标：聚焦盈利，中美争论不休
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，苹果公司旨在从印度采购所有美国 iPhone 手机，以摆脱对中国的依赖
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周五援引知情人士的话报道称，随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战迫使这家科技巨头从中国转向其他国家，苹果公司计划最快于明年将所有在美国销售的 iPhone 手机的组装工作转移到印度。【原文：Apple plans to shift the assembly of all U.S.-sold iPhones to India as soon as next year, the Financial Times reported on Friday citing people familiar with the matter, as President Donald Trump's trade war forces the tech giant to pivot away from China.】

item.title: 中国百度称其昆仑芯片集群可训练类似 DeepSeek 的模型
item.description: 中国百度首席执行官周五表示，百度已成功 "点亮 "了一个由3万个自主研发的第三代P800昆仑芯片组成的集群，该集群可支持类似DeepSeek的模型训练。【原文：China's Baidu has successfully "illuminated" a cluster comprising 30,000 of its self-developed, third generation P800 Kunlun chips, which can support the training of DeepSeek-like models, its CEO said on Friday.】

item.title: 马来西亚愿意与美国就减少贸易逆差和非关税壁垒进行谈判
item.description: 马来西亚贸易部周五表示，马来西亚愿意与美国就非关税壁垒和减少贸易逆差问题进行谈判，并将探讨双边贸易协定。【原文：Malaysia is open to negotiate with the United States on non-tariff barriers and reducing its trade deficit and will explore a bilateral trade agreement, its trade ministry said on Friday.】

item.title: Alphabet 表示，Waymo 未来可能提供个人拥有的机器人出租车
item.description: Alphabet首席执行官桑达尔-皮查伊（Sundar Pichai）周四表示，就在电动汽车制造商特斯拉准备今年在美国推出机器人出租车之际，Alphabet旗下Waymo公司的自动驾驶出租车未来可能会供人们拥有。【原文：Alphabet's Waymo self-driving taxis may be available for people to own in the future, CEO Sundar Pichai said on Thursday, just as electric vehicle maker Tesla gears up to roll out robotaxis this year in the United States.】

item.title: 特朗普关税退让，股市和美元迎来周线上涨
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市连续第二周上涨，美元汇率一个多月来首次出现单周上涨，原因是投资者欢迎白宫对中国的立场明显软化，尽管没有缓和的信号。【原文：Asian stock markets headed for a second straight week of gains on Friday and the dollar for its first weekly rise in more than a month as investors have welcomed an apparent softening of the White House stance on China, despite no signal of detente.】

item.title: 中国的数据保护规定促使欧洲主要科研资助者暂停研究
item.description: 欧洲与中国在病毒和空气质量等领域开展科学合作的几家最大资助机构表示，由于担心中国的数据保护法，它们已暂停了双边研究计划。【原文：Several of Europe’s biggest funders of scientific collaboration with China, in fields such as viruses and air quality, have put bilateral research programmes on hold due to concerns over Chinese data protection laws, funding agencies said.】

item.title: 竞争日趋激烈，百度推出全新人工智能模型
item.description: 中国搜索引擎巨头百度周五发布了其最新的人工智能机型--Ernie 4.5 Turbo，在中国人工智能市场竞争日益激烈的背景下，百度加大了人工智能产品的供应力度。【原文：Chinese search engine giant Baidu launched its latest artificial intelligence model, Ernie 4.5 Turbo, on Friday, as it ramps up AI product offerings amid mounting competition in the Chinese AI market.】

item.title: 美元在特朗普反转的动荡一周结束时走高
item.description: 美元继前一天小幅下挫后，周五继续走高，原因是在唐纳德-特朗普总统就贸易协议和美联储干预发出反复无常的信息后，交易员们对美国经济的前景忧心忡忡。【原文：The dollar drifted higher on Friday, following small losses a day earlier, as traders grappled with the outlook for the U.S. economy following President Donald Trump's erratic messaging on trade deals and Federal Reserve interference.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势让英特尔老款芯片焕发第二春
item.description: 英特尔公司高管周四表示，中美贸易战威胁到英特尔在其最大市场中国的营收，但这已不太可能推动对这家陷入困境的芯片制造商的老一代个人电脑和服务器芯片的需求。【原文：A Sino-U.S. trade war that threatens Intel's revenue from its biggest market, China, has become an unlikely driver of demand for the embattled chipmaker's older generation of personal computer and server chips, company executives said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利担心贸易政策不确定性将导致裁员
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周四表示，美国贸易政策的极度不确定性让他对大规模裁员感到 "紧张"，不过到目前为止，他只听说有企业开始计划在不确定性持续的情况下进行裁员。【原文：Minneapolis Federal Reserve Bank President Neel Kashkari on Thursday said the extreme uncertainty over U.S. trade policy has him "nervous" about big layoffs, though so far he has only heard about businesses starting to plan for the possibility if the uncertainty lasts.】

item.title: 全球供应可能增加，油价将出现周跌幅
item.description: 由于欧佩克+可能增产以及俄乌战争可能停火可能增加供应，同时美国关税信号的冲突又限制了需求前景，油价周五略微走高，但有望出现单周下跌。【原文：Oil prices edged higher on Friday but were on track for a weekly loss as a potential OPEC+ output increase and a possible ceasefire in the Russia-Ukraine war may raise supply at the same time conflicting U.S. tariff signals limit the demand outlook.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，TP-Link 面临美国反垄断刑事调查
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，美国司法部正在对路由器制造商 TP-Link Systems 的定价策略进行刑事反垄断调查。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department is conducting a criminal antitrust investigation into pricing strategies by router maker TP-Link Systems, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】
